name: Plum
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Dining Table light”
”Alexa, turn on Evening”
”Alexa, set Front Porch to 25%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control a single light, groups of lights or all your lights using your voice and any Alexa control device (Echo, Dot etc). Turn lights on or off, or dim them to any level.

Once you activate this skill, you will need to login with the same username and password as you do with your Plum app on your smartphone.

The Plum Lightpad is the most advanced Wi-Fi connected light dimmer available. It connects to your home router over Wi-Fi allowing you to control your lights from your smart phone from home or anywhere with an internet connection. 

You need at least one Plum Lightpad to use this skill, but it also works with 10, 50 or even 100 Plum Lightpads so you can control all the lights in your home.

Plum Lightpads have add luxury, convenience, security and energy savings to your home. Find out more at www.plumlife.com
